events.name: Angular and JHipster night!
events.description: Hi, location is now confirmed. We will host our event at Paypal (Suntec tower). Michael Isvy - Migrating a JSP application to AngularJS Why are so many people moving to AngularJS? Is it a suitable choice for all Java applications? Does it add complexity to your project? Michael will walk you through a step by step migration from JSP to AngularJS. Deepu K Sasidharan - JHispter Deepu is one of the JHipster contributors and we are honored to have him at the Spring User Group. He will walk you through the JHipster core features, do a hands-on demo and will provide feedback on building a real enterprise application using JHipster.
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: Release Planning using Feature points
events.description: Madhur Kathuria - A Certified Scrum Trainer , Certfied Scrum Coach and an Enterprise Agile Transformation coach by profession would be with us and talk about Release Planning using Feature points. He will speak about Release planning in Scrum Projects, various Release rhythms based on different Agile methods and also how to use relative estimation at a Project /Release level. Agenda: 7:00pm - Release Planning using Feature points 8:00pm - O&A Getting There Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 2 is just right above of Downtown station along Downtown Line (DT) .
events.location: Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 2, 10 Marina Boulevard, #23-01, Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 2, 018983, Singapore
